# Tooltip content



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Tooltip Content component wraps around the content of popovers to serve as a stable root for conditional rendering.

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                | Type                | Default        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | -------------- |
| `showOverflow` | `show-overflow` | Determines if the overflowing content should be displayed. | `boolean`           | `false`        |
| `theme`        | `theme`         | Defines the theme of the component.                        | `"Dark" \| "Light"` | `ThemeDefault` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                            |
| ---- | -------------------------------------- |
|      | Passes content to the Tooltip Content. |


----------------------------------------------
